column1: It was as if he were timing something, judging to a nicety some effect he wished to produce.

column1: But tell me if you will, whilst you were attending to these sartorial niceties, the small, yet I feel not insignificant matter of our impending relegation to Sheol didn't, perchance, wend its winged way into your mercurial consciousness? '
